name: Ni Hao Kai Lan Super Game Day
name_original: Ni Hao Kai Lan Super Game Day
description: Get ready to play with Kai-lan and friends in all sorts of super exciting games! You'll get to race to the finish line in a dragon boat, pop colorful bubbles, even catch sun fuzzies! Plus, you can practice your soccer skills, throw water balloons, and so much more to make your heart feel super happy! Let's go, go, go play some games!
